00027 namespace fm
00028 {
00031     template <class T>
00032     class vector : public std::vector<T>
00033     {
00034     private:
00035         typedef typename std::vector<T> Parent;
00036 
00037     public:
00039         typedef typename Parent::iterator iterator;
00040 
00042         typedef typename Parent::const_iterator const_iterator;
00043 
00044     public:
00046         vector() : Parent() {}
00047 
00050         vector(size_t size) : Parent(size) {}
00051 
00055         vector(size_t size, const T& defaultValue) : Parent(size, defaultValue) {}
00056 
00059         vector(const std::vector<T>& copy) : Parent(copy) {}
00060 
00064         vector(const T* values, size_t count) : Parent()
00065         {
00066             resize(count);
00067             memcpy(&Parent::at(0), values, count * sizeof(T));
00068         }
00069 
00074         template <typename ValueType>
00075         inline iterator find(const ValueType& value) { return std::find(begin(), end(), value); }
00076         template <typename ValueType>
00077         inline const_iterator find(const ValueType& value) const { return std::find(begin(), end(), value); } 
00081         inline iterator erase(iterator it) { return Parent::erase(it); }
00082 
00088         inline void erase(iterator first, iterator last) { Parent::erase(first, last); }
00089 
00093         inline bool erase(const T& value) { iterator it = find(value); if (it != end()) { erase(it); return true; } return false; }
00094 
00097         inline void erase(size_t index) { erase(begin() + index); }
00098 
00104         inline bool release(const T& value) { iterator it = find(value); if (it != end()) { erase(it); delete value; return true; } return false; }
00105 
00109         inline bool contains(const T& value) const { const_iterator it = find(value); return it != end(); }
00110 
00113         inline size_t size() const { return Parent::size(); }
00114 
00118         inline void resize(size_t count, const T& value = T()) { Parent::resize(count, value); }
00119 
00124         inline void reserve(size_t count) { Parent::reserve(count); }
00125 
00128         inline iterator begin() { return Parent::begin(); }
00129         inline const_iterator begin() const { return Parent::begin(); } 
00133         inline iterator end() { return Parent::end(); }
00134         inline const_iterator end() const { return Parent::end(); } 
00135     };

00156 
00162 template <typename T>
00163 inline bool IsEquivalent(const std::vector<T>& dl, const T* cl, size_t count)
00164 {
00165     if (dl.size() != count) return false;
00166     bool equivalent = true;
00167     for (size_t i = 0; i < count && equivalent; ++i){
00168          equivalent = IsEquivalent(dl.at(i), cl[i]);
00169     }
00170     return equivalent;
00171 }
